title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the IDE, the expected context menu option is missing.
OB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not displayed.
EB: When I open the context menu, the 'Team' entry should be present.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the IDE. 
2. Open a project that contains a .java file and another resource. 
3. Right-click on the .java file or the other resource to open the context menu. 
4. Verify that the 'Team' entry is not displayed in the context menu.
